name: URL search
content:

<title>Play.com: DVDs, Music and Video Games</title>
<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache">
<meta http-equiv="Content-Language" content="en-us">
<meta name="keywords" content="dvd, dvds, cd, cds, region 2, uk, online, buy, movie, video, region two, playstation, ps2, xbox, gamecube">
<meta name="description" content="Play.com is the top site for region 2 dvds, cds and games in the UK. We stock all major region 2 movies on DVD.">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="playstylesheet3.css" type="text/css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="ss04.css" type="text/css">

<script	language="JavaScript" src="jscriptincludes.js"></script>



</head>


<script	language="javascript">
<!--





// Main Competition PopUp
function PromoCompetitionPopUp(aspFile, productid,productRegion,width,height,x,y)
{	
	// Set up Screen Size and Co-Ordinate information
	var screenheight = screen.availHeight - 10;
	var screenwidth = screen.availWidth - 10;
	var popupWidth = width;
	var popupHeight = height;

	var popupX = screenwidth - popupWidth;
	var popupY = 10;

	// for changing lanes pop up to go in middle of screen
	var popx = screenwidth - 750;
	popx = popx/2;
	var popy = screenheight - popupHeight;
	popy = popy/2;


	// Ensure No competitions on PlayUsa.com for now
	if(aspFile != null && aspFile != 'undefined' &&  productid != null && productid != 'undefined' )
	{

		 var win = null;
		 var servercopy = '';

		

				if(aspFile.indexOf("http://") == -1)
				{

					 win = window.open("/web/20040718062920/http://competition.play.com/"+aspFile+"?s="+escape(servercopy),
					productid,
					 			"width="+popupWidth+",height="+popupHeight+",left="+popupX+",top=0,resizable=no,scrollbars=yes");
				}
				else
				{
					 win = window.open(aspFile, productid,
					 			"width="+popupWidth+",height="+popupHeight+",left="+popupX+",top=0,resizable=no,scrollbars=yes");
				}
			
			
			if(productid != '')
			{
				productid.toLowerCase();
				if(productid.indexOf("promo_") == -1)
				{
			
					if(productid.indexOf("link_") == -1)
					{
						if(!isNaN(parseInt(productid,10)))
						{
							document.location.href = "play247.asp?page=title&r="+ productRegion + "&title="+productid;
						}
					}
					else
					{
						productid=productid.replace("link_", "");
						document.location.href = "play247.asp?page="+productid;
					}
				
				}
				else
				{
					productid=productid.replace("promo_", "");
					document.location.href = "play247.asp?page=promo&r="+ productRegion + "&id="+productid;
				}
			}
			win.focus();
	}

}
